review: Easy to set up, fast enough for your average streamer and with amazon prime TV and Movies, Netflix is almost non essential. For $39, you cant beat the price. I have 2 of them and even with both streaming i never have had an issue. Great buy!!
author: Dennis Bellisle Jr

review: Love the basic remote. Works great (as long as my internet doesn't go down).
author: sitruc159

review: Great device I am very satisfied. It does everything advertised.
author: Rich

review: Totally easy to install and operate and worked really well!
author: Kindle Customer "glv"

review: Does everything we need it to and more.

review: As advertised  but doesn't get all your favorite shows

review: Simple to set up and works wonderfully with our TV. We may have to get rid of cable.
